response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to you to purchase this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its true value, and I am confident it will be a wise investment for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can arrange the details accordingly.", "product_price": 1200000}
